Class ThreadUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • social.thread.ThreadUtility

  • public class ThreadUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    The ThreadUtility class contains the utility functions for dealing with threads

    Author:
    Wa Thone

        public static void displaySimplifiedThread(Thread thread,
                                           int index)

        Parameters:

        index - the index of the thread

      • getThreadByInput

        public static Thread getThreadByInput(java.util.List<Thread> threads,
                                      java.lang.String input)
                               throws InvalidThreadException
        Gets the thread specified by the user's input from the list of threads
        Parameters:
        threads - the list of Thread objects to select from
        input - the user's input, of format
        Returns:
        the Thread object from the list, corresponding to the index of the user's input
        Throws:
        InvalidThreadException
